name: Basic Unix utilities in C
description: The aim of the project is to write basic Unix utilities like 'cat', 'ls', 'grep', etc in C language. The project will help in the better understanding of Unix file system, Shell scripting and writing Makefiles.

name: Collaborative drawing webapp
description: The aim of the project is to create a basic webapp using javascript (pure js or any framework) and socket.io to create a realtime collaborative drawing webapp
github: https: A beginner-friendly project to introduce developers to REST API architecture.//github.com/iamsdas/drawing

name: Email Utility App
description: The aim of the project is to create an app (in js or python) with basic utilities to- validate, verify, send emails, etc. It is a beginner-friendly project to introduce developers to basic app development and REST API architecture.
